column2: can you expand on why you thought our tacos were disgusting? Which tacos did you order? Again
column3: we never shy away from criticism
column4: but we also want to learn from our mistakes. Lastly
column5: our only goal with our restaurant is for every customer to leave our doors happy and satisfied. If you're displeased with your meal for any reason
column6: just let your server know and he or she will remake it
